name: Fragment 7 - VR Platformer
description:
Fragment 7 is a VR platformer prototype aiming to provide freedom of movement while being highly comfortable with no motion sickness.

Dash, jump, climb and fly, avoid enemies and find your way in the one level provided in this prototype!

Feedbacks welcome :)

Warning: If you're using an inside-out tracking HMD (like the Quest), when flying it's better to look straight in front of you and not tilting your head upward too much. :)
